Name: Horus stela, cippus
Description: This small round-topped stela shows Isis standing on two crocodiles, one of which is missing because of the damaged state of the stela. The goddess is holding some roughly modelled wild animals (snakes and scorpions ?) in the outstretched hands. On the back of the stela are three columns of carved fantasy hieroglyphs. This is a fake, imitating a Horus stela, cippus.
